original_text: The inside of the temple was covered with boards made of cedar wood. The workers cut pictures of fruits and flowers on the wood. The cedar boards completely covered the stone walls, so you could not see any stone.
korean_text: 성전 안에 입힌 백향목에는 박과 핀 꽃을 아로새겼고 모두 백향목이라 돌이 보이지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: The inside of the temple was covered with boards
The workers cut pictures of fruits and flowers
The cedar boards completely covered the stone walls
so you could not see any stone
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 어떤 돌도 볼 수 없었습니다
